title: Chinook pipeline parameters
description: Schema for the Full GT pipeline parameters

project.description: Give a name to this project or run. No spaces or special characters.

input.description: Path to input FastQ files (must be paired-end)

min_overlap.description: FLASH2: Minimum overlap length for read merging

max_overlap.description: FLASH2: Maximum overlap length for read merging

ots28_missing_threshold.description: If less than this much OTS28 data is missing, consider OTS28 data Intermediate instead of uncertain

gsi_missing_threshold.description: If more than this much GSI data is missing, consider GSI data invalid

pofz_threshold.description: If the maximum PofZ is less than this, consider the result ambiguous
